__e: He said you were a good man. That he trusted you with his life.
There is a wickedness it is within my power to see corrected.
He said you were the best, and he said that if it were his child, you'd be the only people he'd trust to help.
At the same time, it's hard to trust a man who can't trust himself with a beer.
Let me know I can trust you, if you're only a liar or if I can put my son and my business in your hands.
And frankly, I don't know if I can trust you to have it.
